KinesisStreamArn.description: Kinesis stream ARN to which log events are published.
KinesisStreamArn.markdownDescription:
Kinesis stream ARN to which log events are published.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: arn:[\w+=/,.@-]+:kinesis:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]*:[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,12}:stream/.+  
Update requires: No interruption
